```{r}
file_path <- "./data/spam.csv"
if (!file.exists(file_path)) {
  dir.create("./data")
  url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/spambase/spambase.data"
  download.file(url = url, 
                destfile = file_path)
}
```
